text:
@ochocinco $terrykayci
That would be a blessing.. I just started working again since this whole covid-19 started. My 2 kids and I may have to go back to my moms 1bedroom apartment. my landlord doesnt want to wait another 2 weeks. Anything would help us..
 Thank you, stay safe!!
$terrykayci
